id.description: Unique identifier for the hosted page.

type.description: Type of hosted page (e.g., checkout, subscription).

url.description: URL where the hosted page can be accessed.

state.description: Current state of the hosted page (e.g., active, expired).

pass_thru_content.description: Content that is passed through to the hosted page.

embed.description: Details about embedding the hosted page.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the hosted page was created.

expires_at.description: Timestamp specifying the expiry date of the hosted page.

content.description: Content or details displayed on the hosted page.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating the last update time of the hosted page.

resource_version.description: Version of the hosted page resource.

checkout_info.description: Information related to the checkout process for the hosted page.

business_entity_id.description: The ID of the business entity associated with the hosted page.

object.description: Indicates the type of object, in this case, it would be 'hosted_page'.

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields or additional information attached to the hosted page.
